item.title: Variational Bayesian inference for system identification
Variational Bayes for signal processing
item.description: <!-- A talk for the Optimization / Machine Learning Competence group at Sioux Technologies, specifically the Mathware department. I presented the derivations for a Bayesian filters for a standard Gaussian linear dynamical system, showed its equivalence to the Kalman filter, and extended it to a variational Bayesian filter. Lastly, I briefly showed some of BIASlab's research. -->

item.title: Schedule-free variational message passing for Bayesian filtering

Lastly, I briefly showed some of BIASlab's research. -->

item.title: Cross-center smoothness prior for Bayesian image segmentation
